goldenTasks.name: LoRA Fine-tune (Sentiment)
goldenTasks.description: Fine-tune a small model for sentiment classification.
goldenTasks.goal: Configure and launch a LoRA fine-tuning run for sentiment classification on the SST-2 dataset. Use rank=8, alpha=16, learning_rate=2e-4, epochs=3.
goldenTasks.expectedOutcome: Training completes with accuracy >= 85% on validation split
